channel.title: Comments on: Marquise on Meringue – Daring Bakers Challenge May 2011

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: This looks delicious!! Great job on the challenge, I am so sorry that I missed it. But from reading everyone's posts about how they made giant messes in their kitchens, maybe its a good thing, haha. Wish I could have tasted some, though!
item.content:encoded: This looks delicious!! Great job on the challenge, I am so sorry that I missed it. But from reading everyone’s posts about how they made giant messes in their kitchens, maybe its a good thing, haha. Wish I could have tasted some, though!

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Gorgeous idea using a tequila caramel and spiced nuts! And even though it looks complicated it sounds like people enjoyed it :)
item.content:encoded: Gorgeous idea using a tequila caramel and spiced nuts! And even though it looks complicated it sounds like people enjoyed it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: Anita this looks so amazing! Your presentation is always faultless. I do love it when you thik the worst thing on the plate is the one thing everyone loves ;)
item.content:encoded:
Anita this looks so amazing! Your presentation is always faultless.
I do love it when you thik the worst thing on the plate is the one thing everyone loves ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Robyn Clarke
item.dc:creator: Robyn Clarke
item.description:
Love the way you plated the Marquise, looks really elegant.
I attempted the nuts, but burnt them and didn't have time to get any more.
item.content:encoded:
Love the way you plated the Marquise, looks really elegant.

I attempted the nuts, but burnt them and didn’t have time to get any more.

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Wow! This was an amazing challenge! So many components. Your presentation is lovely and I bet it tasted divine!
item.content:encoded: Wow! This was an amazing challenge! So many components. Your presentation is lovely and I bet it tasted divine!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Wonderful job on this challenge! It looks absolutely professional. I didn't try to make the spiced nuts so I can't comment on how good they were, but they certainly look delicious!
item.content:encoded: Wonderful job on this challenge! It looks absolutely professional. I didn’t try to make the spiced nuts so I can’t comment on how good they were, but they certainly look delicious!

item.title: By: Nachiketa
item.dc:creator: Nachiketa
item.content:encoded:
What a lovely Marquise….. and fabulous plating ðŸ™‚
Chilli n Cherry in Chocolate Marquise on Lemon Meringue

Cheers,
The Variable, Crazy Over Desserts – Nachiketa
Catch me on facebook @ Crazy Over Desserts

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Whipping all those components up in 30 minutes is an amazing feat - well done! It's nice to hear you'd make it again too.
item.content:encoded: Whipping all those components up in 30 minutes is an amazing feat – well done! It’s nice to hear you’d make it again too.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: This dessert was just beautiful !!!!!!! I had a piece which didn't have the cocoa coating, as I find cocoa a bit bitter. I could certainly eat this one again, hint, hint!!!!!
item.content:encoded:
This dessert was just beautiful !!!!!!!
I had a piece which didn’t have the cocoa coating, as I find cocoa a bit bitter.
I could certainly eat this one again, hint, hint!!!!!
